scripts.allPlatformBuild: ng build && copyfiles --flat src/netlify.toml dist && copyfiles --flat src/netlify.toml dist/food-order && copyfiles --flat src/netlify.toml dist/food-order/browser && copyfiles --flat src/vercel.json dist && copyfiles --flat src/vercel.json dist/food-order && copyfiles --flat src/vercel.json dist/food-order/browser
scripts.vercelBuild: ng build && copyfiles --flat src/vercel.json dist && copyfiles --flat src/vercel.json dist/food-order && copyfiles --flat src/vercel.json dist/food-order/browser
scripts.netlifyBuild: ng build && copyfiles --flat src/netlify.toml dist && copyfiles --flat src/netlify.toml dist/food-order && copyfiles --flat src/netlify.toml dist/food-order/browser
